channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Colleting recycling, 9th July
item.description:
On Tuesday 08/07/2025 was our collection day of recycling + rubbish @66 Cranwich Rd the Dustpin man took my private wheeler bin that was washed and was upside down to dry out in order to collect all the green sacks -- but took it away this is robbery ?????
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cranwich Road, Hackney, London

Bad smell

item.title: Traffic causes property to shake., 9th July
item.description:
Traffic going too fast / heavy frequency of vehicles is causing property to shake. Has been worse since recent road works, digging up the street and refilling in early 2025.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73,75, Lawrie Park Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox with large amount of blood on road, 9th July
item.description:
I have come across a dead fox in the road on martin dene in junction with Oakland road. The fox appears to be a young fox and appears to have a large amount of blood pouring from his mouth onto the road and its ear protruding from its socket. I didn’t witness the collision however, my concern is that this may be quite distressing to residence and passers by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oaklands Close, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping at 31 Watts Street, Registration LV12 NRX, Black Toyota, 9th July
item.description:
Fly tipping from persistent offender, Black Toyota vehicle, Registration LV12 NRX. This guy drives up to corner of Watts Street and Kelly Avenue at least once a week and dumps his rubbish. Please take action Southwark Council

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Watts Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Left rubbish, 9th July
item.description:
1: some tiles/stones left by Zipvan user 2: lots of weeds growing by electric box and on pavement, effectively blocking the pavement

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Culford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog waste and dangerous dog and negligent owners, 9th July
item.description:
Just watched two lads with a massive dog take it off muzzle and set it on a small black cat outside Arica House. Dog was very aggressive- they trapped the cat in the play park north of Arica house and then set the dog off lease to hunt it. The cat was terrified and it clearly violated the 2006 animal welfare act - if the dog had caught the cat it would have mauled it to death clearly. It happened 9/7/25 at 2315.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slippers Place, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shattered glass, 9th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Parkside, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress left in front garden for over a month, 9th July
item.description:
There is a mattress and abandoned furniture left in this garden for over a month. Can it be removed please? Very unsightly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Meynell Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Suspicious van parking for several days with covered rear number plate, 9th July
item.description:
This van has parked here a few times in the last couple of weeks. Don’t believe it is local. It used to be a Sainsbury’s van but the decals have been removed. It keeps wrapping rags over its rear number plate seemingly to try to hide it. Seems suspicious.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Meynell Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The bus lane road works, 9th July
item.description:
